mapper.select: select pao.no, pao.pro_option_code, pro_option_name, pao.pro_option_detail_code,pro_option_detail_name from pro_add_option pao, pro_option po, pro_option_detail pod where pao.pro_option_code = po.pro_option_code and pao.pro_option_detail_code = pod.pro_option_detail_code and pro_no=#{no}
